reviewText:
Hanshi Minobu MIKI did not authorize the production of this video and receives none of it's profits.

The filming cuts in and out and wobbles around.  Just when Hanshi MIKI is about to make an important point, the filming stops and resumes just as he finishes, and it cuts off an important demonstration of technique.  It's very frustrating to watch.

Also the poor quality of the video equipment shows.
